page.title: 19A DAY GIRL'S LIFE
page.content: I AM A{DAY GIRL}AS I LIVE IN BATTLE. ON SCHOOL DAYS I WAKE UP AT 7.30AM AND HAVE BREAKFAST AT 8AM.THEN I MAKE MY BED AND FEED MY RABBIT BEFORE GOING BY CAR TO SCHOOL.I FOLLOW THE SCHOOL ROUTINE DURING THE DAY;AS A SECOND FORMER,I STUDY TWELVE SUBJECTS INCLUDING ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCES, FOREIGN LANGUAGES, HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY, CURRENT AFFAIRS, ART, HOME ECONOMICS AND P.E. I ALSO HAVE EXTRA LESSONS AFTER SCHOOL SUCH AS LATIN, HORSE RIDING AND PIANO.THESE ARE OPTIONAL SO I CAN GO HOME AT 4PM IF I WANT TO, BUT I USUALLY STAY TO PREP AND MY FATHER COLLECTS ME AT 7PM.AFTER MY SUPPER I WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL 9.15PM WHEN I GO TO BED.I DONT HAVE TO GO TO SCHOOL AT WEEKENDS UNLESS THERE IS AN INTER- HOUSE COMPETITION.INSTEAD I GO SHOPPING, SEE MY FRIENDS AND WATCH TELEVISION.
